references:
The remainder of this paper is organized as follows.
The system model of the STAR-RIS integrated NOMA and AirFL framework is given in Section II where the concurrent communication mechanism is designed and an efficient signal processing scheme is developed to mitigate the interference among hybrid users.
Convergence analysis is provided in Section III where a non-convex resource allocation problem is formulated.
Next, Section IV proposes an alternating optimization algorithm to control uplink transmit power and STAR-RIS configuration.
Finally, simulation results are presented in Section V, followed by conclusions in Section VI.
The key symbols and main notations are listed in Table I.
